sentence.Network_en: He was too sorry and disturbed to wish to catechize or confuse him further.
sentence.Network_cn: 他太懊恼,心烦,不愿再盘问他.

PerfectNetExp.abs: chondrify的意思中文翻译 ... catechism meeting 问答式的谈话 catechize 以问答法讲授, 盘问 catechol [化]儿茶酚, 苯磷二酚.
英语词汇新译 C_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... catechist 问答教授 catechize 问答法讲授 catechol 儿茶酚.

list.abs: as a matter of fact , this almost mechanical catechism is merely a dialog in form , through which the interactivity and cooperation between teachers and students cannot be virtually realized .其实，这种近乎机械的问答只是形式上的对话，根本没有真正实现教师与学生之间的互动、合作。
business meeting 业务会议catechism meeting 问答式的谈话class meeting 班会; 级会closed-
they catechized him if he knew where the hostage was .他们诘问他是否知道人质在哪里。
The catechism is used for religious instruction ., 教义问答法常用于宗教教学.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via late Latin from ecclesiastical Greek katēkhizein, from katēkhein 'instruct orally, make hear'
